text: (akave, ittakaiya camayattil) unmai nampikkaiyalarkal allahvin valiyil (avaciyam) porpurivarkal. Nirakarippavarkalo (ivarkalukku etiraka) saittanutaiya valiyiltan porpurivarkal. Akave, saittanutaiya nanparkalitam ninkal porpuriyunkal. (Avarkalin ennikkaiyaip parttu tayanki vitatirkal.) Niccayamaka saittanutaiya culcci mikavum palavinamanatakave irukkiratu
